html: These, where had they been "These then, where were they?"—, The conjunction is added before ,אלה , elleh, that is, ,ואלה , veelleh,. in thirty-two MSS. (nine ancient) of Kennicott's, and fifty-four of De Rossi's, and so the Septuagint, Chaldee, and Vulgate. See the note on Isaiah 49:12; (note).
